name: Advanced Lawn Mower Simulator Next
description:
The most advanced domestic chore simulation is back!

Advanced Lawnmower Simulator was first reviewed in the April 1988 issue of Your Sinclair, now 32 years later the legend returns for the ZX Spectrum Next with improved graphics and sound.

You, a humble YTS junior gardener, start off with a very small tool-box, one can of petrol and a standard issue Campari "Lawn Master" motor mower. Can you make it across the randomly generated gardens in one piece?

Now features digitised sound effects, speech and AY music!
